objects.specification: A flat square floor panel with a smooth matte surface, subtle texture, and a neutral light gray finish. The floor features a slight bevel along its edges to define the booth boundary and provide a clean transition from the surrounding area.

A vertical rectangular wall panel with clean, sharp edges and a smooth matte plaster surface in a light gray tone. The wall is uniformly thick and designed to provide a sturdy backdrop for hanging elements.

A vertical rectangular wall panel with clean, sharp edges and a smooth matte plaster surface in a light gray tone. The wall is uniformly thick and designed to provide structural enclosure on the side.

A modern reception desk featuring a simple rectangular form with smooth surfaces and gently rounded corners. It has a glossy white finish, integrated modesty panel, and recessed leg space for ergonomic interaction.
A minimalist cuboid display stand with a square top surface and solid base. It has a smooth matte white finish and seamless construction, ideal for showcasing individual products.

An elongated rectangular hanging banner crafted from lightweight textile material. It features crisp edges, a vibrant printed surface, and a slight natural drape, designed to suspend elegantly from overhead.

A round table with a circular tabletop supported by a single central cylindrical pedestal leg. It has a smooth matte white surface with a subtle beveled edge for a contemporary look.
A contemporary four-legged chair with a gently curved backrest and flat seat surface. It features slender legs and smooth molded plastic construction in a matte finish for ergonomic comfort.
